Hero.HeroTitle: Scoot In, Secure Up Welcome to ScootSpace Parking!
Hero.HeroSubtitle: Our hubs in Skopje offer convenience, sustainability, and security. Enjoy easy payments, free charging, and peace of mind as you explore the city. Discover a cleaner, greener way to get around.

AboutScootspace.AboutScootspaceSubtitle: At ScootSpace, we're more than just a parking facility; we're a revolution in urban mobility. As the sole company offering electric scooter parking solutions in the country, our commitment to convenience, sustainability, and security is unrivaled.

AboutScootspaceCards.CardSubtitle1: ScootSpace is the sole provider of electric scooter parking services in North Macedonia. We are your dedicated and trusted partner in elevating your urban mobility experience.
AboutScootspaceCards.CardSubtitle2: We go the extra mile by offering free charging for your scooter. Say goodbye to the hassle of finding charging stations; we've got you covered.
AboutScootspaceCards.CardSubtitle3: Your peace of mind is paramount. Our facilities are equipped with top-tier security features, ensuring your scooter is always in safe hands when you choose ScootSpace.

HowToPark.HowToParkSubtitle: Parking your electric scooter with ScootSpace is a breeze. Simply locate the nearest ScootSpace hub using our app, secure your scooter, and make an easy payment. It's that simple! No reservations, no complications. Experience the ultimate convenience in urban mobility with ScootSpace.

HowToParkCards.CardSubtitle1: Can be scanned by the ScootSpace app

HowToUseTheApp.HowToUseTheAppSubtitle: Getting started with our app is a walk in the park. Check the steps to your right, and you'll be smoothly navigating our platform. Discover the simplicity of urban mobility with ScootSpace!

HowToUseTheAppCards.Card1Step1: 1. Open your smartphone's app store (iOS App Store or Google Play Store).
HowToUseTheAppCards.Card1Step2: 2. Search for ScootSpace and download the official app.
HowToUseTheAppCards.Card1Step3: 3. Install the app on your device and open it.
HowToUseTheAppCards.Card2Step1: 1. Approach the ScootSpace parking machine located within the parking zone.
HowToUseTheAppCards.Card2Step2: 2. Open the ScootSpace app and navigate to the 'Park Scooter' option.
HowToUseTheAppCards.Card2Step3: 3. Use the app's built-in QR code scanner to scan the QR code displayed on the parking machine.
HowToUseTheAppCards.Card3Step1: 1. Once the QR code is successfully scanned, the app will confirm the parking process.
HowToUseTheAppCards.Card3Step2: 2. Press the 'Lock' button on the app's interface.
HowToUseTheAppCards.Card3Step3: 3. Your scooter's locking mechanism will activate, securing it in place within the parking slot.

PricingPlan.PricingPlanSubtitle: We believe in keeping things straightforward and budget-friendly. Our pricing structure consists of a single plan:
PricingPlan.PricingPlanParagraph: With ScootSpace, you get more than just parking; you get a hassle-free and comprehensive solution for your electric scooter. Enjoy peace of mind knowing that your scooter is safe, charged, and ready to go whenever you need it. Discover the convenience, security, and sustainability that ScootSpace offers for just 120 denars per hour.
